title: Prawn and crab dim sum
description: An assembly of fine flavours and fruits of the sea, these delicious little dumplings are irresistible for any seafood lover.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz raw tiger prawns, peeled, deveined and chopped
5g dried orange peel, soaked in boiling water for 20 minutes
3 fresh water chestnuts, peeled (alternatively use canned chestnuts if fresh unavailable)
